text: It's no secret that Kim Kardashian and Beyonce have not always seen eye - to - eye. But when Beyonce's old group Destiny's Child comes on the radio, even Kim and her buddy Carla DiBello find themselves unable to resist joining in. Kim, 37, posted a video to her Insta Story on Saturday of herself and Carla bopping along to the 2001 Destiny's Child song Bootylicious. Having a ball : When Beyonce's old girl group Destiny's Child comes on the radio, even Kim Kardashian ( right ) and her pal Carla DiBello find themselves unable to resist joining in Rumors of a feud between Kim and Beyonce have been circulating for years, ever since Kim took up with Kanye West
